sense.def:
A misunderstanding
pomeni, da človek ne razume nečesa, na primer položaja ali besed drugega človeka.

seg.quote: This was a minor misunderstanding which could be instantly cleared up.

sense.def:
Kadar dva človeka
have a misunderstanding
, se o nečem ne strinjata ali se nekoliko spreta.

seg.quote: They usually sort out their misunderstandings.
